moves.1. e4: Attention faithful fans,followers and WATCHERS!PLEASE PLEASE hold off awhile longer before starting my fan club.Also again if any of my adoring fans wish to send my games in to chess life magazine feel free.Another suggestion would be to copy game frame it and hang it in your living room or den.Also could copy place in frame on your nightstand where you can see chess greatness as you go to sleep and wake.So here we go .He opens with e4
moves.1... d6: d6 response was going to try something different
moves.3. Nc3: Both his cowboys out.Bf8 blocked in.Alittle nervous about my development.Just feel behind
moves.3... Nc6: After doing this i think Nf6 would have been better
moves.4. d3: He now has both knights out and a good chain
moves.6. exf5: lose pawn but next move i take revenge and attack more of middle
moves.6... Bxf5 7. Qd2 Nf6: I finally bring out last cowboy
moves.8... d5: break chain but now i cover g4,f4,e4,d4 c4,b4 and a3
moves.9... exd4: take out d4 and fork Be3 and Nc3
moves.10... Nxd4: i shoot his cowboy but in doing so i trade my cowboy
moves.11. Qxd4 Nd7: retreat with my cowboy to regroup
moves.13... Rf8: try to set him up to take queen
moves.14... Nf6: honestly i do not know what i was thinking here
moves.16... Rxf6: take out his preacher,queen making me nervous
moves.19... Rd6: put heat on cowboy with rook but rook in danger by Qg3
moves.20. Nxe7: takes out Be7 and treatens Bf5
moves.21. Nxf5: King sitting there waitng to be killed.If he sacked queen would stayed in game
